# CLLocationUpdate.Updates

**Structure**

A structure that represents an asynchronous sequence of location updates.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Updates
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocationUpdate] uses this structure to asynchronously deliver a stream of location updates to your app when you call [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLLocationUpdate/liveUpdates(_:)].

## Type aliases

- **CLLocationUpdate.Updates.Iterator**: The type of the update’s iterator.

## Receiving location updates

- **liveUpdates(_:)**: Tells Core Location to start delivering the location updates it produces for the configuration you specify.
- **CLLocationUpdate.LiveConfiguration**: Values for indicating the kind of updates the framework delivers.

## Conforms To

- AsyncSequence
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
